file.content:
<Window x:Class="pdb.player.Vue.Conf.Debug" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" SizeToContent="WidthAndHeight" Title="Debug" > <Grid> <Grid> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition /> <RowDefinition /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition /> <ColumnDefinition />
</Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="0" Name="cb_rank" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Correction via Rang" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="1" Name="cb_coeff" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Correction via Coeff" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <StackPanel Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2"> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Name="cb_zero" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Correction via Zero" Margin="2" Padding="2" /> <TextBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="2" Name="tb_zeroOptim" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Correction via Zero performante" Margin="2" Padding="2" /> </StackPanel> <CheckBox Grid.Row="0" Grid.Column="3" Name="cb_dontTouchMain" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Pas touche aux main" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <CheckBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" Name="cb_sortSt" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Tri stack" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <CheckBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" Name="cb_sort0" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Tri avec coeff à 1" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <CheckBox Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="2" Name="cb_sortSt0" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Tri stack avec coeff à 1" Margin="5" Padding="2" />
<CheckBox Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" Name="cb_reset" Width="30" VerticalAlignment="Center" ToolTip="Remise à 1 du coeff" Margin="5" Padding="2" /> <Button Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Name="bt_apply" VerticalAlignment="Center" Content="Appliquer" Click="bt_apply_Click"/> </Grid> <StackPanel Orientation ="Horizontal" HorizontalAlignment="Center">
</StackPanel> </Grid> </Window>
